summary: Adds spells that enhance unarmed combat with magical damage.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=15]Punch People - with magic![/size][/b][/center]

[b]Features:[/b]
[list]
[*]Stone Skin: Increases Armor and Unarmed Damage (based on Alteration Skill). Also increases your Alteration with every punch.
[*]Fire Skin: adds area fire damage while unarmed. blocking casts a fire cloak.
[*]Ice Skin: adds frost damage while unarmed. invests 50 magicka and increases armor.
[*]Lightning Skin: unarmed attacks deal shock damage and restore magicka. constantly drains magicka while active. also increases attack speed based on current magicka level.
[/list]

[b]Required Mods:[/b]
Attack Speed Mod
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28456
SKSE
http://skse.silverlock.org/

[b]How to use:[/b]
Install the Required Mods
Install using Nexus Mod Manager.
The spells are added to your spell book when you load the game.

[b]Recommended Mods:[/b]
Dual Wield Parrying http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9247 
which adds blocking for unarmed and different weapon combinations
author: MonoGami

files.name: Unarmed Magic
files.changelogHtml:
the spells are now added to the player on load
stone skin now scales with your alteration skill instead of the mage armor perks
stone skin also properly raises the skill when hit

files.name: Unarmed Magic
files.changelogHtml:
Fire Fist, Ice Fist, Lightning Fist added. These spells work a lot like Bound Weapon spells
fixed lightning skin magicka cost
fixed dispell of skin spells

files.name: Unarmed Magic
files.changelogHtml:
Fist spells integrated into Skin spells. When unarmed, elemental fists are automatically equipped
added effects for all fist spells

files.name: Unarmed Magic
files.changelogHtml:
Lightning Skin now constantly drains magicka, but restores magicka when punching
Ice Skin now invests magicka and increases armor. also added ice form effect.
Fire Skin Unarmed Attacks deal area damage
